title: No cursor in game
body:
Hello,

Is anyone having this issue after the most recent update?  I have tried everything I could find on the forums, reinstalled LoL entirely, reinstalled my mouse drivers and still nothing.  The old suggestions of turning on the tailing of the mouse and everything did not produce any results.   Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you

replies.body: Is the cursor completely missing, or just invisible?  For example, could you potentially click on something?  I wonder if you are using any third party programs like overlays, as they can cause issues like this.  If so, remove them and let me know if that helps!
